title: Add ICEs to Glacier

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

labels.name: metabug
labels.description: Issues about issues themselves ("bugs about bugs")

labels.name: E-mentor
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue has a mentor. Use RustcContributor::new on Zulip for discussion.

body:
My [Glacier](https://github.com/steveklabnik/glacier) repository is tracking our ICEs. Once per day, a Travis build confirms that the example still causes an ICE.

@Manishearth suggested I make a metabug here, so if you're looking for an easy way to contribute, this is it! I'm willing to mentor anyone who needs help.

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3AI-ICE is the list of bugs. Here's a tracking list of which ones that have been added:
- [x] https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29191
- [x] https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29184
